docs.abstract: John Montague Massengale letter on Segway Human Transport
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''An Inventor Unveils His Mysterious Personal Transportation Device'' (Business Day, Dec. 3):
docs.snippet: To the Editor:    Re ''An Inventor Unveils His Mysterious Personal Transportation Device'' (Business Day, Dec. 3):

headline.main: Personal Business; Shaken Consumers Are Looking to Life Insurance

docs.abstract: Terrorist attacks on US cause shaken consumers to look to life insurance, making it easier for agents and companies to sell; rates have not increased; photo; list of Web sites providing information (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: FOR years, life insurance was a hard sell. Even some companies that sold it began dropping ''life insurance'' from their names and calling themselves financial services companies. They recognized that Americans had become less interested in buying protection for their families than in making investments intended to make themselves comfortable in retirement. But the terrorist attacks turned life insurance into a hot commodity.
